text: Nocardioides daphniae is a gram-positive bacterium from the genus Nocardioides that has been isolated from the water flea Daphnia cucullata from Lake Balaton in Hungary.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides daphniae at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase daphniae Category:Bacteria described in 2008
title: Nocardioides daphniae
